courseDetails.title: Mitigating Bias and Ensuring Fairness in GenAI Systems
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master Bias Detection and Mitigation in Generative AI: Tools, Techniques, and Best Practices for Ethical AI Development
courseDetails.longDescription:
Uncover the secrets to creating ethical, inclusive, and unbiased Generative AI systems in this comprehensive course. With the rise of AI in decision-making processes, ensuring fairness has never been more critical. This course equips you with practical tools and techniques to detect, evaluate, and mitigate biases in AI models, helping you build systems that are both transparent and trustworthy.

Starting with the basics, you’ll learn how biases manifest in AI systems, explore fairness metrics like demographic parity, and dive into advanced strategies for bias mitigation. Discover how to use leading tools such as AI Fairness 360, Google What-If Tool, and Fairlearn to measure and reduce biases in datasets, algorithms, and model outputs.

Through hands-on demonstrations and real-world case studies, you’ll master pre-processing techniques like data augmentation, in-processing techniques like fairness constraints, and post-processing methods like output calibration. Additionally, you’ll develop strategies for ongoing bias monitoring, feedback loop integration, and robust model governance.

Whether you’re an AI developer, data scientist, tech manager, or ethical AI enthusiast, this course provides actionable insights to build fair, inclusive AI systems that align with global standards like GDPR and the EU AI Act.

By the end of the course, you’ll have the confidence and skills to tackle bias in Generative AI, ensuring your models serve diverse user groups equitably and responsibly. Join us and take your AI expertise to the next level!
targetAudiences: AI developers and machine learning engineers interested in fairness and bias mitigation.
Data scientists aiming to build ethical and inclusive AI systems.
Tech leads and managers overseeing AI projects and fairness compliance.
Ethical AI practitioners and researchers working on responsible AI deployment.

courseDetails.title: Endpoint Management Fundamentals

Learn how to effectively manage endpoints throughout their lifecycle with our comprehensive course, "Master Endpoint Lifecycle Management: Secure, Optimize, and Decommission Devices Effectively." Whether you're an IT professional, system administrator, or security enthusiast, this course equips you with the knowledge and tools to handle endpoints from acquisition to retirement with confidence.

Discover the essential strategies for endpoint management, including configuration, monitoring, and performance optimization. Learn to apply best practices for securing devices, ensuring compliance, and maintaining operational efficiency. Explore advanced decommissioning techniques, such as securely wiping data, recycling hardware responsibly, and preventing security risks during the end-of-life phase.

  • Applying secure practices for data protection and compliance.

  • Leveraging tools and templates to simplify endpoint management.

With no prior experience required, this course is ideal for IT beginners and professionals alike. Gain practical insights, actionable strategies, and industry-standard techniques to elevate your endpoint management skills. Enroll today and take the first step toward mastering endpoint lifecycle management!
targetAudiences: IT professionals looking to enhance endpoint management skills.

courseDetails.title: Public Speaking and Presentation Skills Masterclass
courseDetails.shortDescription: From nervous to confident speaker, Captivate your audience, Speak up & stand out, Craft your message, command the room
courseDetails.longDescription:
This dynamic program equips you with the skills and confidence to deliver impactful presentations that resonate with any audience. Through a blend of informative modules, interactive exercises, and expert guidance, you'll master the art of public speaking and become a persuasive and influential communicator.

Here's a glimpse into the powerful strategies you'll explore:

  • The Bedrock of Effective Communication: Discover the foundation of successful presentations and unlock the power of clear, concise messaging. Learn to leverage active listening and overcome communication barriers for maximum impact.

  • Understanding Your Communication Style: Delve into self-reflection techniques and communication style assessments like Myers-Briggs and DISC. Gain insights into your strengths and weaknesses to tailor your communication approach for greater effectiveness.

  • Conquering Public Speaking Anxiety: Explore the root causes of presentation anxiety and develop powerful coping mechanisms. Master relaxation techniques, cultivate a growth mindset, and shift your focus to empower yourself as a speaker.

  • Crafting Compelling Presentations: Learn to define clear objectives, structure your content logically, and craft a captivating introduction and persuasive conclusion. Engage your audience with storytelling techniques and compelling visuals.

  • The Magic of Audience Engagement: Unleash interactive elements like polls, discussions, and Q&A sessions to keep your audience actively involved. Techniques for capturing attention with humor, storytelling, and audience-centric content will be explored.

  • Body Language Mastery: Decode the power of nonverbal communication. Understand how facial expressions, gestures, posture, and eye contact significantly impact your message. Practice confident and assertive body language for a commanding presence.

  • Handling Questions Like a Pro: Develop strategies to confidently handle audience questions. Learn to actively listen, clarify questions, respond with composure, and navigate challenging scenarios with grace.

  • Rehearse and Refine: Discover the importance of dedicated rehearsal time. Practice vocal delivery, refine body language, and incorporate visual aids seamlessly. Learn to address nervousness, utilize visualization techniques, and iterate for a polished performance.

  • Managing Presentation Anxiety: Develop a toolbox of techniques to manage presentation anxiety. Learn to prepare mentally and physically, and discover confidence-building habits that bolster your composure.

  • Techniques for Capturing Audience Attention: Engaging your audience is key to keeping them invested in your presentation. We'll explore various techniques, from strong openings to interactive elements and multimedia integration, to capture and maintain audience attention throughout your speech.

  • Mastering Non-Verbal Communication: Body language plays a crucial role in communication. You'll master the art of non-verbal communication, from facial expressions to gestures and posture, learning how to convey confidence and assertiveness in any speaking situation.

  • Crafting a Clear and Concise Message: Effective communication is about delivering your message with clarity and impact. Through practical techniques such as storyboarding and feedback analysis, you'll learn how to craft a clear and concise message that resonates with your audience.

  • Managing Nerves and Maintaining Composure: Finally, we'll address how to manage nerves and maintain composure during your presentation. From understanding presentation anxiety to developing confidence-building habits, you'll be prepared to deliver your speech with poise and professionalism.

This course is for you if:

  • You want to Deliver impactful presentations at work, school, or conferences

  • You want to Overcome public speaking anxiety and gain confidence

  • You want to Captivate audiences with clear and concise communication

  • You want to Master storytelling techniques to enhance presentations

  • You want to Craft compelling visual aids that support your message

  • You want to Leverage interactive elements to engage your audience

  • You want to Develop a strong and confident stage presence

  • You want to Handle questions with poise and professionalism

  • You want to overcome public speaking anxiety and deliver presentations with confidence.

  • You aim to become a more impactful communicator and leader.

  • You desire to engage your audience, inspire action, and leave a lasting impression.

  • You're a professional seeking to advance your career through powerful presentations.

Additional Materials:

  • Downloadable resources, including templates, checklists, and cheat sheets.

  • Access to a supportive online community for ongoing learning and peer-to-peer interaction.

By the end of this course, you'll be equipped to deliver dynamic presentations that inspire, inform, and persuade your audience. Enroll today and unleash the power of your voice!
targetAudiences: Career Climbers Seeking an Edge: Stand out from the competition with the presentation skills to impress interviewers, deliver impactful pitches, and confidently advocate for yourself.

courseDetails.title: Time Management Masterclass: Focus, Productivity and Balance
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master time management, productivity, planning, habits and focus to create more clarity, balance and meaningful results.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Time is the most valuable resource you have, and in this course, you will learn how to use it with intention, clarity and confidence. Whether you feel overwhelmed, scattered or simply want to bring more structure into your days, this training will help you build the skills and mindset of a true time master.

We begin by exploring the Time Master’s Mindset, a shift in perspective that changes the way you think about time, productivity and control. Through personal stories and practical insights, you will understand why so many people struggle with time and how simple shifts in awareness can open the door to real transformation.


From there, we build your foundation. You will learn how to conduct a time audit, uncover hidden patterns, clarify your priorities and design a personal time plan that aligns with what matters most. This is where intention meets practicality, and where your new habits start to take shape.

Next, we move into the planning and scheduling skills that make productivity feel natural and consistent. You will learn weekly planning, daily routines, prioritization methods and how to balance calendars, tasks and commitments without feeling overwhelmed.


As you progress, you will explore advanced tools that increase focus and efficiency. Techniques like Pomodoro, batching, minimizing context switching and strategic delegation will help you get more done with less stress. You will also discover tech tools that support your progress rather than distract you.

We will also tackle the inner challenges that hold you back. Together we will explore procrastination, energy management, habit building and the emotional side of productivity. You will learn how to create routines that last, maintain motivation and stay focused even on tough days.


You will then apply your skills across different areas of life. You will learn how to manage time at work, protect personal and family boundaries, make space for learning and navigate interruptions without losing momentum.

Finally, we focus on long term mastery. You will learn how to review your progress, build resilience, maintain balance and prevent burnout. The goal is not just to be productive for a week. It is to create a lifelong relationship with time that supports your growth, wellbeing and purpose.


By the end of this course, you will feel more organized, more focused and more in control of your time. You will have a personal blueprint that brings structure to your days and clarity to your goals. This is your path to clarity, balance and meaningful progress.


Let’s begin.
targetAudiences: For anyone who wants more structure, focus and balance in daily life.
For professionals who want to manage tasks and deadlines with confidence.
For students and learners who want better habits and study routines.
For busy people who feel overwhelmed and want clarity and control.
For anyone ready to improve productivity without burning out.

courseDetails.title: Master Prompt Engineering: ChatGPT & Gemini—Any AI Tool
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn to write prompts through a structured framework—RACTC, personas, few-shot/negative prompting, and iteration
courseDetails.longDescription:
Master practical prompt engineering you can use at work—today.
Learn a fast, tool-agnostic system to turn vague asks into decision-ready outputs in any AI chat tool (ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini). Learn the core of prompt engineering in a few hours of committed learning. Then use proven frameworks—and AI-assisted practice—to level up your skills. This course is designed around that approach.

Why this course is different

  • System over scripts: a repeatable method (pre-flight + persona/audience + formatting + iteration), not a random prompt list.

  • Work outputs, not theory: produce exec snapshots, team updates, customer notes, and structured data you can reuse.

  • Tool-agnostic & safe: everything works in any AI chat tool, with data-sensitivity and hallucination controls baked in.

What you’ll learn

  • Use a simple pre-flight (Role, Audience, Context, Task, Constraints) to design reliable prompts every time.

  • Apply persona & audience techniques to control tone, depth, and format.

  • Steer models with few-shot and negative examples; avoid off-topic replies.

  • Use reasoning prompts (step-by-step, self-check) for clearer, more accurate results.

  • Format outputs for work: labeled summaries, bullet updates, tables & JSON.

  • Run a fast iteration loop (R.A.C.T.C pre-flight + AI-assisted critique/edit) to measurably improve result

  • Spot & reduce hallucinations using context bounds, cite-as-you-go, and self-check prompts.

  • Work safely: set truth bounds, avoid risky inputs, and align with workplace policies.

After this course, you’ll be able to

  • Turn the same facts into an executive snapshot (5 labels, ≤75 words) or a team update (owners/dates) on demand.

  • Build a personal prompt library and reuse templates across projects.

  • Deliver clearer drafts faster and collaborate confidently with AI.

Who it’s for

Busy professionals and non-coders—PMs, marketers, analysts, ops, HR, educators, freelancers, founders—anyone who wants reliable AI outputs fast.

What’s included

Short, action-packed lessons • Live demos • Hands-on practice • Downloadable prompt cards, checklists, and templates.

Coming soon: Additional modules with new demos and assignments will be added in the next 2 weeks.

Bring one real task from your job and an AI chat tool. By the end, you’ll have a proven workflow to go from vague ask → audience-ready output in minutes, not hours.
targetAudiences: Busy professionals who need reliable AI outputs fast (PMs, marketers, analysts, ops, HR, educators, founders, freelancers).

courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to our comprehensive course on mastering HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. In this course, you will acquire the skills you need to construct modern and responsive web applications by creating entertaining and engaging projects.

Our course is designed to offer you a hands-on experience, guiding you on how to code web applications from scratch with the latest web technologies: HTML5, CSS3, and vanilla JavaScript. You do not need any previous knowledge of HTML, CSS, or JavaScript since we will take you through every syntax and explain each step in detail. Our course is suitable for both beginners and experienced programmers. Whether you’re new to coding or looking to refresh your skills, our course is perfect for you.

We believe that learning should be enjoyable and engaging, which is why we’ve created an array of modern, super-cool, and captivating projects that you will develop throughout the course. Each project is created independently from scratch, and you can choose which ones to work on based on your interests.

Our course features separate videos for each technology, enabling you to learn and focus on the areas that interest you the most. For instance, if you’re primarily interested in JavaScript, you can skip the HTML and CSS sections and dive right into the JavaScript videos.

I’m Vijay Kumar, a web developer with over 8 years of experience. I’ll be your guide throughout the course, answering any questions you may have and providing valuable feedback to help you become a proficient web developer.


NOTE: This course is Recorded in Hindi Language! and the Subtitle is auto-generated.


Are you ready to immerse yourself in the exciting world of web development? Join us today and start building astonishing websites!


  1. Internet Status Checker: This project checks the online status of the user's device using JavaScript. The result is displayed on an HTML page styled with CSS. The project uses the navigator. Online property to check the online status of the user's device. If the device is online, the project displays the text "Online" on the page. If the device is offline, the project displays the text "Offline" on the page.

  2. Palindrome Checker: This project checks if a given string is a palindrome using JavaScript. The user inputs the string through an HTML form and the result is displayed on the page, styled with CSS. The project uses a recursive function to check if the string is a palindrome. The function starts at the beginning and end of the string and compares the characters at each index. If the characters are the same, the function continues to the next index. If the characters are not the same, the function returns false.

  3. RGB Color Generator: This project generates random RGB (red, green, blue) color values using JavaScript. The generated color is displayed on an HTML page, with the background color changing to the generated color. The page can be styled with CSS. The project uses the Math. random() function to generate random numbers between 0 and 255. The three random numbers are used to create an RGB color value. The color value is then used to change the background color of the page.

  4. Counter Application: This project is a simple counter application that uses JavaScript to increment and decrement a count value. The count value is displayed on an HTML page and buttons can be added to increment and decrement the count. The page can be styled with CSS. The project uses two variables to store the count value and the button click event handlers to increment and decrement the count value. The count value is then displayed on the page.

  5. ASCII and Unicode Character Detector: This project uses JavaScript to detect whether a given character is an ASCII or Unicode character. The user inputs the character through an HTML form and the result is displayed on the page, styled with CSS. The project uses the String.fromCharCode() function to convert the character to a string. The charCodeAt() function is then used to get the ASCII code of the character. If the ASCII code is between 0 and 127, the character is an ASCII character. Otherwise, the character is a Unicode character.

  6. Analog Clock Application: This project displays an analog clock with the current time on an HTML page using JavaScript. The clock is created using CSS to style the clock's face and hands. The project uses the Date() object to get the current time. The current time is then used to set the position of the clock's hands.

  7. Random Color Generator: This project generates random colors in any format (e.g. RGB, HEX, HSL) using JavaScript. The generated color is displayed on an HTML page, with the background color changing to the generated color. The page can be styled with CSS. The project uses the Math. random() function to generate random numbers between 0 and 255. The three random numbers are used to create an RGB color value. The color value is then converted to the desired format and displayed on the page.

  8. BMI Calculator Application: This project calculates the user's body mass index (BMI) based on their height and weight using JavaScript. The user inputs their height and weight through an HTML form and the result is displayed on the page, styled with CSS. The project uses the Math. round() function to round the BMI value to two decimal places. The BMI value is then displayed on the page.

  9. Loan Calculator: This project calculates the monthly payment and total interest for a loan based on the loan amount, interest rate, and loan term using JavaScript. The user inputs these values through an HTML form and the result is displayed on the page, styled with CSS. The project uses the Math. pow() function to calculate the monthly payment. The monthly payment is then multiplied by the loan term to calculate the total interest. The total interest is then displayed on the page.

  10. Love Calculator: This project calculates a "love percentage" between two people based on their names using JavaScript. The user inputs their names through an HTML form and the result is displayed on the page, styled with CSS. The project uses a simple algorithm to calculate the love percentage. The algorithm adds up the number of letters in each name and then divides the sum by 2. The love percentage is then displayed on the page.

courseDetails.title: Die Bandscheibe verstehen - Werde dein Bandscheibencoach

courseDetails.longDescription:
Befreie dich von Rückenschmerzen, verstehe deinen Körper und lerne, wie du Bandscheiben, ISG und Beckenschiefstand effektiv vorbeugst und behandelst!

Rückenschmerzen gehören zu den häufigsten Beschwerden weltweit – und die Ursachen sind oft komplex: Bandscheibenprobleme, Dysfunktionen des Iliosakralgelenks (ISG) oder ein Beckenschiefstand können Schmerzen, Einschränkungen und chronische Beschwerden verursachen. In diesem komplett strukturierten Onlinekurs lernst du wissenschaftlich fundiertes Wissen, praxisnahe Tipps und Alltagsstrategien, die deine Wirbelsäule nachhaltig stärken.


Was du lernen wirst


  • Anatomie & Funktion: Verstehe, wie Bandscheiben, ISG und Becken aufgebaut sind und wie sie zusammenarbeiten, um Stabilität und Beweglichkeit zu gewährleisten.

  • Pathologien erkennen: Lerne die typischen Symptome von Bandscheibenvorfällen, ISG-Blockaden oder Beckenschiefständen zu identifizieren und richtig einzuordnen.

  • Diagnostik & Selbsttests: Nutze einfache klinische Tests, funktionelle Analysen und Bildgebung, um mögliche Ursachen von Rückenschmerzen zu erkennen.

  • Prävention & Therapie: Setze effektive Übungen, Core-Training, Mobilisation und Dehnung ein, um Schmerzen zu reduzieren, Dysbalancen auszugleichen und Rückfällen vorzubeugen.


Warum dieser Kurs?


  • Für jeden geeignet: Ob Einsteiger oder Sportler, ob Büroarbeiter oder aktiver Mensch – der Kurs ist klar strukturiert und progressiv aufgebaut.

  • Praxisnah & sofort umsetzbar: Du erhältst Schritt-für-Schritt-Anleitungen, Tipps für zu Hause und den Alltag sowie praktisches Wissen zur Integration in deinen Tagesablauf.

  • Wissenschaftlich fundiert: Alle Inhalte basieren auf aktuellen Studien und evidenzbasierten Erkenntnissen aus Physiotherapie, Orthopädie und Sportwissenschaft.

  • Langfristige Ergebnisse: Lerne nicht nur, Schmerzen zu lindern, sondern auch, deine Wirbelsäule, ISG und Becken dauerhaft zu stabilisieren und zu stärken.


Wer profitiert am meisten


  • Menschen mit chronischen oder wiederkehrenden Rückenschmerzen

  • Sportler und aktive Menschen, die Dysbalancen vermeiden möchten

  • Büroangestellte, die viel sitzen und Rückenschmerzen vorbeugen wollen

  • Therapeuten, Trainer oder Gesundheitsinteressierte, die ihr Wissen vertiefen möchten


Kurs-Highlights


  • 8 Module mit über 40 Lektionen

  • Ausführliche Schritt-für-Schritt-Fallbeispiele

  • Selbsttests und Diagnosetools für zu Hause

  • Praktische Alltagsintegration und Ergonomie-Tipps

  • Videos zum besseren Verständnis des Körpers


Investiere in deine Rückengesundheit und lerne, wie du Schmerzen effektiv vorbeugst, behandelst und deine Wirbelsäule langfristig stabilisierst – starte noch heute!

courseDetails.title: AZ-900: Microsoft Azure Fundamentals Certification Training
courseDetails.shortDescription: Pass AZ-900 Certification Exam With Confidence | Learn Azure in Step By Step Approach | Practice Test Included
courseDetails.longDescription:
The AZ-900: Azure Fundamentals Complete Training course is an in-depth guide to mastering the foundational concepts of Microsoft Azure, perfect for beginners aiming to kickstart a career in cloud computing.

This course thoroughly covers essential Azure services, cloud computing principles, and management tools, making it ideal for IT professionals, developers, and anyone preparing for the AZ-900 certification exam.

Through detailed sections and hands-on labs, you'll gain confidence in navigating Azure’s environment and learn practical applications of cloud computing in a variety of business scenarios.

Course Overview

  1. Basics of Cloud Computing: Start with understanding cloud computing fundamentals, including various service types (IaaS, PaaS, SaaS) and the shared responsibility model. You'll explore cloud deployment models (public, private, and hybrid) and gain a clear understanding of CapEx and OpEx in cloud infrastructure.

  2. Benefits of Cloud Computing: Dive into the numerous advantages of cloud adoption, such as scalability, high availability, and reliability. This section will help you understand how cloud computing can be cost-effective and secure while allowing businesses to go global with minimal infrastructure investments.

  3. Creating Setup for Azure Labs: This section walks you through creating a free Azure account to set up a lab environment, providing a hands-on foundation for practical learning.

  4. Core Architectural Components of Azure: Gain insights into Azure datacenters, availability zones, global infrastructure, regions, and region pairs, laying the groundwork for understanding Azure’s global footprint and operational resilience.

  5. Management Structure of Microsoft Azure: Understand the organizational structure within Azure, from resources and resource groups to subscriptions and management groups, which helps in organizing and managing access and billing.

  6. Azure Networking Services: Learn about Azure's robust networking capabilities, including Azure Virtual Network (VNet), Network Security Groups (NSGs), private and public endpoints, and ExpressRoute for secure connectivity.

  7. Azure Compute: Discover compute options such as Azure Virtual Machines, Virtual Desktops, Containers, Functions, and application hosting, allowing for versatile workload management.

  8. Azure Storage Services: This section covers storage options like Azure Blob Storage, Azure Queues, Table Storage, Disk Storage, and migration tools, emphasizing storage redundancy for enhanced data resilience.

  9. Identity & Access Management in Azure: Learn Azure Active Directory (AD), Azure AD Domain Services, conditional access, RBAC, and the Zero Trust model, providing a robust identity and security foundation.

  10. Cost Management in Azure: Understand factors affecting costs, the Azure Pricing Calculator, Total Cost of Ownership (TCO) Calculator, and Azure Cost Management Tool to efficiently monitor and manage expenses.

  11. Governance and Compliance Tools: Discover Azure Blueprints, Azure Policy, Resource Locks, and the Azure Service Trust Portal, enabling compliance and governance within cloud environments.

  12. Azure Management Tools: Get hands-on with tools like the Azure portal, Cloud Shell, CLI, PowerShell, Azure Arc, and ARM templates for managing and automating Azure resources.

  13. Monitoring Tools in Azure: Learn to use Azure Advisor, Service Health, and Azure Monitor to optimize resource usage, improve system health, and stay proactive with recommendations and alerts.

Enroll in AZ-900: Azure Fundamentals Complete Training to gain comprehensive, practical knowledge essential for Azure certification success and advancing your cloud computing career.

This course equips you with all the tools and understanding needed to thrive in the ever-evolving world of Azure.

From setting up your development environment to grasping the essentials of the Android architecture, this module will equip you with the knowledge needed to tackle the subsequent projects with confidence.


Module 2: Fragment TabLayout Multi List App

In this hands-on module, you'll delve into the intricacies of creating a Fragment TabLayout Multi List App. Learn to implement fragments for a responsive user interface, utilize the power of TabLayout to organize your content seamlessly, and master the art of displaying dynamic lists. By the end of this project, you'll have a multifaceted app that showcases your ability to handle complex user interfaces.


Module 3: Pokemon List App in Android With Recycler View

Gotta catch 'em all! In this project, you'll channel your inner Pokémon Trainer as you build a Pokemon List App using the powerful Recycler View. Discover how to fetch and display data dynamically, creating a visually appealing and interactive app that leverages the strengths of the Recycler View to efficiently handle large datasets. Unleash your creativity and design a Pokemon-themed application that brings your development skills to the forefront.


Module 4: Weather Application - A Mini Weather Application

Become a weather wizard in this module as you craft a Mini Weather Application. Explore the integration of APIs to fetch real-time weather data, implement intuitive user interfaces to present information, and add a touch of flair to graphical representations. By the end of this project, you'll have a functional weather app that not only showcases your programming prowess but also provides valuable, real-world information.


Throughout the course, you'll receive step-by-step guidance, insightful explanations, and practical tips from an experienced instructor. Each module builds upon the last, reinforcing your understanding of Android development concepts and techniques. By completing this course, you'll not only have three impressive projects to showcase in your portfolio but also the knowledge and skills to tackle future Android development challenges with confidence.

Enroll now and embark on your journey to becoming a proficient Android developer!

Students or professionals seeking to add valuable Android development expertise to their resumes.
Entrepreneurs or individuals with app ideas looking to understand the process of turning concepts into functional applications.
Anyone curious about mobile app development, ready to explore the dynamic world of Android programming.

courseDetails.title: Make a Flappy Bird Game From Scratch in Unity 6.3 & C#
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn the basics of 2D game development in Unity 6.3 by building out a complete game from scratch.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Master Unity Fundamentals Quickly!

A complex game engine such as Unity can seem daunting at first, but this course will cover all the basics clearly with the development of a complete game like the iconic "Flappy Bird".

I believe we learn best by doing so I skip the fluff and dive right into making the game from the start, explaining every step, every component and every line of code along the way.

Not only do I explain what I am doing, but perhaps even more importantly, why I am doing it.

Build And Modify a Full Game

We start with a blank project and build out a fully playable game with basic physics, animation and even a "slowmo death cam" in just under 2 hours! We'll then cover the building and publishing of the game.

A hands-on approach is proven to improve how much of the information you retain, therefore the course presents multiple ideas for how you can tweak the game to make it your own and practice your skills.

A Short Course to Get You Started

This course is presented as a standalone course; nothing else is required and there are no pre-requisites. No matter where you're starting from, by the end of this course you'll have a fully working and fun game to play and tweak!
targetAudiences: Complete beginners to game development
Anyone interested in making 2D games
Anyone wanting to get started with the Unity engine
Programmers wanting start making games
